mapper.select: select GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_THEME, GROUP_BUILDER_ID, GROUP_LEADER_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, GROUP_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT from GROUP_TABLE where GROUP_ID in (select GROUP_ID from MEMBER_TABLE where MEMBER_ID= #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.delete: delete from FRIEND_TABLE where FRIEND_A = #{param1,jdbcType=INTEGER} and FRIEND_B = #{param2,jdbcType=INTEGER} or FRIEND_A = #{param2,jdbcType=INTEGER} and FRIEND_B = #{param1,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into GROUP_TABLE (GROUP_NAME, GROUP_THEME, GROUP_BUILDER_ID, GROUP_LEADER_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID, COMMENT) values (#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupBuilderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupLeaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupDeputy1Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupDeputy2Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupDeputy3Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into GROUP_TABLE (GROUP_NAME, GROUP_THEME, GROUP_BUILDER_ID, GROUP_LEADER_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, GROUP_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT) values (#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupBuilderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupLeaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupDeputy1Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupDeputy2Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupDeputy3Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalVolume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{existedVolume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupTimeBuild,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GROUP_TABLE set GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_THEME = #{groupTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_BUILDER_ID = #{groupBuilderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_LEADER_ID = #{groupLeaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID = #{groupDeputy1Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID = #{groupDeputy2Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID = #{groupDeputy3Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_VOLUME = #{totalVolume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EXISTED_VOLUME = #{existedVolume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GROUP_TIME_BUILD = #{groupTimeBuild,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_THEME, GROUP_BUILDER_ID, GROUP_LEADER_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, GROUP_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT from GROUP_TABLE where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_THEME, GROUP_BUILDER_ID, GROUP_LEADER_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID, TOTAL_VOLUME, EXISTED_VOLUME, GROUP_TIME_BUILD, COMMENT from GROUP_TABLE
